attributes.action: Pass legislation that obliges the Home Secretary to follow the recommendations of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs (ACMD)
attributes.additional_details:
We wish the government to pass legislation that requires the Home Secretary to abide by the recommendations of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs (ACMD).
Which is to say to fully implement in law any recommendations that they make, and to never act contrary to advice that they issue.
